message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing $60 for me and $40 for you. I think this is fair considering future rounds will devalue the total amount for me. Let me know your thoughts!

Hi Alice, since you face 10% inflation per round and I don't, delaying is more costly for you than for me. I'm proposing $55 for myself and $45 for you. This is a fair split considering your time pressure is greater than mine. If we continue negotiating, your share will be worth even less to you due to inflation.
